Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, 48th pl & into the terminal, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, 48th Place & into the terminal, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at California.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
